title: How to boot your Vist & Seven from usb by using (( cmd )) only

forumNotes.author: albarwn
forumNotes.content:
السلام عليكم ورحمة الله وبركاته peace of Allah the lord upen you



THE SUBJECT IS CLEAR you will need (( usb flash or external harddisk 4 giga bait or more ))
usb flash or external harddisk should be one partition
![Posted Image](http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/6616/13063637.gif)
(( cd of win vista or seven )) as you like ![:mellow:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/mellow.png)
the prosses will take about 3 min to finish it ![:mellow:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/mellow.png)
ok let,s start (( i will put pic to all thing be clear ))
from -- start --- all Programs---- Accessories -- Command Prompt (( run as admin in win vista or seven ))
or in run tape (( cmd ))



![Posted Image](http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/7854/53978442.gif)
in first step will will format the usb and convert it to ntfs file system tape this command (( look good there are slash and space ))
convert g: /fs:ntfs
(( g is my flsh letter you must chang it ))
![Posted Image](http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/6616/13063637.gif)
(( you can pass this step by formating your flash with any format toll as hp flash tool ))
if your flash not in ntfs file system you will have this window
![Posted Image](http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/8259/79544807.gif)
but if it ntfs file system you will have this window
![Posted Image](http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/1808/51413373.gif)
now we will run the disk part by taping this command
diskpart (( wiat about 5 sec it will run the toll ))
![Posted Image](http://img688.imageshack.us/img688/2125/30896152.gif)
now tape this command
list disk
![Posted Image](http://img839.imageshack.us/img839/2711/24886726.gif)

you will see the drivers of your pc or lap top
chooce your flash (( you will Recognition it by it size ))
now tape select disk=1 (( 1 is your usb flash ))


now tape select partition=1 (( 1 is your usb flash ))

![Posted Image](http://img831.imageshack.us/img831/287/85994363.gif)
now tape
active
![Posted Image](http://img444.imageshack.us/img444/4673/48149160.gif)

now to exit from disk part
tape (( exit ))

![Posted Image](http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/3247/91458187.gif)
dont close the Command Prompt minimize it the last steps to make it ready
open the cd or the iso image of win seven or vista (( and copy all the file and paste it inside the usb flash ))
now open the Command Prompt
we gone to copy a file from win cd to in side the flash usb
tape
:h
h is my win cd


![Posted Image](http://img820.imageshack.us/img820/2673/012f.gif) than tape
cd boot

![Posted Image](http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/4948/70861709.gif)
than tape

bootsect.exe /nt60 :g
g is my usb flash

![Posted Image](http://img409.imageshack.us/img409/5562/67292619.gif)

wait for second
if you have this massege
![Posted Image](http://img844.imageshack.us/img844/1314/91950194.gif)
all thing done in right way or back from the Beginning

i hope its Useful and easy way
God Bless you all

Regards ![:mellow:](http://reboot.pro/public/style_emoticons/default/mellow.png)
